content: The energy of NYC is electric. Back in my old stomping grounds, just in time for my 22nd birthday. Feels like coming home.
Just had a great catch-up with a mentor from my travels. We brainstormed some sustainable tech startup ideas. Excited to explore these.
Diving into AI-driven tools to refine my trading algorithms. The learning curve is steep, but the potential to automate is worth it.
Had an interview for a quant finance role. Asked some tough questions, but I think my $XVI experience helped. Fingers crossed!
Birthday reflections: turning 22 has made me realize how much I've grown. Time to use that experience for bigger things.
Just got a callback for the quant finance position. They liked my approach to risk management. Now to prepare for the next round.
